meta_description: Visit us today to enjoy the collection and special exhibitions, hands-on activities, dining, shopping, and more!
hours_text:
The Gardiner Museum welcomes and inspires audiences of diverse backgrounds, abilities, and experiences through the rich history and storytelling power of clay.

Located in the heart of Canada’s largest and most diverse city, the Gardiner stewards a collection of over 5,000 objects from the Ancestral Abiayala, Europe, Japan, and China, as well as contemporary works with an emphasis on leading Canadian artists.

[](/wp-content/uploads/Main-Page-Image-2.jpg)

Discover the collections and special exhibitions, get hands-on with clay, find one-of-a-kind gifts at the Gardiner Shop, dine at Clay Restaurant, and more.

Plan your visit today!

## Building Community with Clay

* * *

Discover our transformation! The **Gardiner Museum** is now open, with a completely reimagined ground floor, including new Collection Galleries and our first-ever Gallery of Indigenous Ceramics. [Learn more](https://www.gardinermuseum.on.ca/fromthegroundup/)
